page.title: 15INDUSTRY/CHEMICAL/FARMING
page.content: Norsk Hydro (formerly Fisons Fertilizers) was established in 1950 on a 100 acre site in the docks complex. Vessels up to 28000 tons dead weight can be accomodated. A 800 ton per hour transporter crane handles the raw materials on to a 1000 ton per hour conveyor system. Over 1 million tons of raw materials are unshipped each year. Phosphate rock, some 600,000 tons, is the main import. Various plants in the complex create new compounds - superphosphate, phosphoric acid, ammonium phosphate, and compound fertilizers. Over 600,000 tons of intermediates and products are distributed each year from the complex.
